segments.text: Hello , Mr . Compton ? This is Susan Miller .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Susan . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d like to take tomorrow off if that ’ s all right with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me take a look . Just a second . That ’ s no problem , Susan . See you on Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2
